column4: I got a small stupid question for you ubuntu users, I'd first liek to say I know my way around linux (recompiling linux, changing permissions, basic stuff like that), and before i moved to ubuntu...is ubuntu...well..'respectable'?, I dont want to be using something that is like...fisher price.  I hope someone knows what I mean so they can elaborate =/
i think it is, but it's fine, really
I'd use pure debian, but I can NEVER get gnome looking good, ha, im terrible with X
it's the same XD just get a secksi theme
I could never get any distro looking as nice (in my eyes) as my old fedora box:  http://i48.photobucket.com/albums/f239/codvx/Screenshot-1.png
that theme is bluecurve. just find it and use it :P
if you want su back type sudo makepasswd and choose a root password and you will be able to use su from then on
